mapper.select: select cmu.user_sn, coalesce(sso.user_id, onepass."ci", '-') as user_id, coalesce(sso.user_nm, onepass.user_nm, '-') as user_nm, coalesce(dqvs.pca_decrypt(sso.mbl_telno, '150'), dqvs.pca_decrypt(onepass.mbl_telno, '150'), '-') as mbl_telno, coalesce(sso.eml_addr, onepass.eml_addr, '-') as eml_addr, ogdp_nm, ogdp_dept_nm, dqvs.pca_decrypt(assi_telno, '150') as assi_telno, cmptnc_zone_cd, authrt_cd, (select concat(ctpv_nm, ' ', sgg_nm) from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_area where stdg_cd = cmptnc_zone_cd) stdg_nm, (select authrt_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_user u left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_auth a on u.authrt_cd = a.authrt_cd where u.user_sn = #{userSn}::numeric) authrt_nm, agency.co_nm, case when cmu.user_sn in (select user_sn from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso) then 'sso' when cmu.user_sn in (select user_sn from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass) then 'onepass' else '-' end as user_login_path, cert.cert_yn, to_char(cert.cert_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as cert_dt from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_user cmu left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_cert cert on cert.user_sn = cmu.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass onepass on onepass.user_sn = cmu.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso sso on sso.user_sn = cmu.user_sn left join dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency on agency.bzmn_sn = cmu.bzmn_sn where cmu.user_sn = #{userSn}::numeric order by cert.cert_dt desc

select * from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by vrfc_dmnd_dt desc) AS SN, T.*, (SELECT dcmc.cd_nm FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code dcmc WHERE dcmc.cd_group = 'verify_cd' AND dcmc.cd = T.res_cd) AS res_nm FROM ( SELECT vrfc_rslt_cd AS res_cd, vrfc_hstry_sn, rqstr_sn, (SELECT user_nm FROM ( SELECT uu1.user_sn, COALESCE(uu2.user_nm, uu3.user_nm) AS user_nm FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT user_sn FROM ( SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso UNION ALL SELECT user_sn FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass ) AS uu ) AS uu1 LEFT OUTER JOIN dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso AS uu2 ON (uu1.user_sn = uu2.user_sn) LEFT OUTER JOIN dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_onepass AS uu3 ON (uu1.user_sn = uu3.user_sn) ORDER BY user_sn ) uut WHERE uut.user_sn = TI.rqstr_sn ) AS rqstr_nm, SUBSTRING(dln, 1, 6) || '******' AS dln, lcns_asort_cd, CASE lcns_asort_cd WHEN '11' THEN '1종대형' WHEN '12' THEN '1종보통' WHEN '13' THEN '1종소형' WHEN '14' THEN '대형견인' WHEN '15' THEN '구난차' WHEN '16' THEN '소형견인' WHEN '32' THEN '2종보통' WHEN '33' THEN '2종소형' WHEN '38' THEN '원동기' ELSE lcns_asort_cd END AS lcns_type, TO_CHAR(vrfc_dmnd_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') vrfc_dmnd_dt, TO_CHAR(rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') rent_bgng_dt, rent_end_dt, CASE vrfc_mthd WHEN '1' THEN '직접입력' WHEN '2' THEN 'OCR' WHEN '3' THEN '모바일면허증' WHEN '4' THEN 'API' END AS vrfc_mthd, prcs_se FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_verf TI where 1=1
and vrfc_dmnd_dt >= to_date(#{dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and vrfc_dmnd_dt <= to_date(#{dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
) T WHERE rqstr_sn = #{userSn}::numeric ORDER BY SN ASC ) C where 1=1
AND C.SN <= (CAST(#{take} AS INTEGER) + CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER))
AND C.SN > CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER)

/* 검증이력 건수 조회 */ SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_verf TI where rqstr_sn = #{userSn}::numeric
and vrfc_dmnd_dt >= to_date(#{dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and vrfc_dmnd_dt <= to_date(#{dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
